00042 |   includes
00043 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/

00045 
00046 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00047 |   PLT_InputDatagramStream
00048 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00054 class PLT_InputDatagramStream : public NPT_InputStream
00055 {
00056 public:
00057     // methods
00058     PLT_InputDatagramStream(NPT_UdpSocket* socket);
00059     virtual ~PLT_InputDatagramStream();
00060     
00061     NPT_Result GetInfo(NPT_SocketInfo& info);
00062 
00063     // NPT_InputStream methods
00064     NPT_Result Read(void*     buffer, 
00065                     NPT_Size  bytes_to_read, 
00066                     NPT_Size* bytes_read = 0);
00067 
00068     NPT_Result Seek(NPT_Position offset) { NPT_COMPILER_UNUSED(offset); return NPT_FAILURE; }
00069     NPT_Result Skip(NPT_Size offset) { NPT_COMPILER_UNUSED(offset); return NPT_FAILURE; }
00070     NPT_Result Tell(NPT_Position& offset){ NPT_COMPILER_UNUSED(offset); return NPT_FAILURE; }
00071     NPT_Result GetSize(NPT_LargeSize& size)   { NPT_COMPILER_UNUSED(size); return NPT_FAILURE; }
00072     NPT_Result GetAvailable(NPT_LargeSize& available) { NPT_COMPILER_UNUSED(available); return NPT_FAILURE; }
00073         
00074 protected:
00075     NPT_UdpSocket*      m_Socket;
00076     NPT_SocketInfo      m_Info;
00077 };
00078 
00079 typedef NPT_Reference<PLT_InputDatagramStream> PLT_InputDatagramStreamReference;
00080 
00081 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00082 |   PLT_OutputDatagramStream
00083 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00089 class PLT_OutputDatagramStream : public NPT_OutputStream
00090 {
00091 public:
00092     // methods
00093     PLT_OutputDatagramStream(NPT_UdpSocket*           socket, 
00094                              NPT_Size                 size = 4096,
00095                              const NPT_SocketAddress* address = NULL);
00096     virtual ~PLT_OutputDatagramStream();
00097 
00098     // NPT_OutputStream methods
00099     NPT_Result Write(const void* buffer, NPT_Size bytes_to_write, NPT_Size* bytes_written = NULL);
00100     NPT_Result Flush();
00101 
00102     NPT_Result Seek(NPT_Position offset)  { NPT_COMPILER_UNUSED(offset); return NPT_FAILURE; }
00103     NPT_Result Tell(NPT_Position& offset) { NPT_COMPILER_UNUSED(offset); return NPT_FAILURE; }
00104 
00105 protected:
00106     NPT_UdpSocket*     m_Socket;
00107     NPT_DataBuffer     m_Buffer;
00108     NPT_SocketAddress* m_Address;
00109 };
00110 
00111 typedef NPT_Reference<PLT_OutputDatagramStream> PLT_OutputDatagramStreamReference;
